snippet: The agency said on Friday that it approved the deals for Time Warner Cable and Bright House Networks this week with conditions.
abstract: Federal Communications Commission says it has approved Charter Communications' purchases of Time Warner Cable and Bright House Networks; deals need approval from California regulators.
lead_paragraph: The agency said on Friday that it approved the deals for Time Warner Cable and Bright House Networks this week with conditions.

headline.main: F.C.C. Backs Charter’s Acquisition of Cable Companies
headline.print_headline: Charter Gets Approval of F.C.C. for 2 Deals
